name: Conjuration
description: Summoners who create objects and creatures from thin air.

2.name: Conjuration Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a conjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Minor Conjuration
2.description: As an action, conjure a small nonmagical object you've seen, which lasts for 1 hour or until damaged or you use this feature again.

6.name: Benign Transposition
6.description: Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space or swap places with a willing creature; reuse after a long rest or after casting a conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

10.name: Focused Conjuration
10.description: Your concentration on conjuration spells can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

14.name: Durable Summons
14.description: Creatures you summon or create with conjuration spells gain 30 temporary hit points.
